D

decMovementCooldown() - Method in class isometricviewv2.Entity
EFFECTS: decrements the movement cooldown, once per frame.
drawLog(Graphics, JPanel) - Method in class isometricviewv2.InfoLog
REQUIRES: graphics context and a jPanel to draw the log onto.
drawPlayer(JPanel, Graphics, BufferedImage[], Entity) - Method in class isometricviewv2.Map
REQUIRES: jPanel to draw on, graphics context to draw with, a set of images representing the player and the entity instance holding the player's information.
drawScene(JPanel, Graphics, BufferedImage[], BufferedImage[], Entity) - Method in class isometricviewv2.Map
REQUIRES: a jPanel to draw on, a graphics context to draw with, the sub images representing both tiles and the player, as well as the entity instance holding player information.
